framebuffer



GFX_BACKBUFFER

#define GFX_BACKBUFFER 0
type: C preprocessor definition

GFX_NULL_BUFFER

#define GFX_NULL_BUFFER 0
type: C preprocessor definition

GfxAttachmentType

type: C enum
GFX_ATTACHMENT_NONE
GFX_ATTACHMENT_DEPTH render_buffer
GFX_ATTACHMENT_DEPTH_SAMPLE as texture
GFX_ATTACHMENT_STENCIL render_buffer
GFX_ATTACHMENT_STENCIL_SAMPLE texture
GFX_ATTACHMENT_DEPTH_STENCIL render_buffer
GFX_ATTACHMENT_DEPTH_STENCIL_SAMPLE // texture

GfxFramebuffer

typedef struct {
  gfx_id            id;
  gfx_id            color_zero_id;
  PixelFormat       color_zero_format;
  gfx_id            attachment_id; // depends on type
  GfxAttachmentType attachment_type;
  PixelFormat       attachment_format;
  uint              width;
  uint              height;
} GfxFramebuffer;
type: C struct

gfx_framebuffer_bind

void gfx_framebuffer_bind(gfx_id buffer_id);
type: C function

gfx_framebuffer_create

void gfx_framebuffer_create(GfxFramebuffer *framebuffer, uint width, uint height, PixelFormat format, GfxAttachmentType attachment);
type: C function

gfx_framebuffer_delete

void gfx_framebuffer_delete(const GfxFramebuffer *framebuffer);
type: C function

GfxReadPixelFormat

type: C enum
GFX_READ_PIXEL_STENCIL_INDEX
GFX_READ_PIXEL_DEPTH_COMPONENT
GFX_READ_PIXEL_DEPTH_STENCIL
GFX_READ_PIXEL_RED
GFX_READ_PIXEL_GREEN
GFX_READ_PIXEL_BLUE
GFX_READ_PIXEL_RGB
GFX_READ_PIXEL_RGBA

gfx_read_pixels

void gfx_read_pixels(uint x, uint y, uint width, uint height, GfxReadPixelFormat format, Image *output);
type: C function

GfxReadBufferMode

type: C enum
GFX_READ_BUFFER_BACK
GFX_READ_BUFFER_COLOR_0

gfx_read_buffer_mode_set

void gfx_read_buffer_mode_set(GfxReadBufferMode mode);
type: C function
